movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: Knives Out
movies.description: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son from a more advanced cyborg.

movies.title: American History X
movies.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.description: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime and corruption.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.description: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.
